Name: Among the Dead
About the game: Among the Dead - is an episodic choice-based visual novel about life after the zombie apocalypse. You need to fight with zombies and make decisions which can affect the further story. This is the first episode. - Fighting with zombies (Clicking) - Episodic novel - Steam Achievements
